page.title: 05FOOD
page.content: The main meal in a working day,is usually taken when the family comes home for the evening and wants something quick to cook ,yet which has nourishment. For example; Chilli con carne which you buy in packets, or chips and beefburger baps from a deep freezer. Leisure eating is eating in a posh restaurant or it could be eating fish and chips in a cafe. Example, in a Chinese restaurant a 3 course meal for 4 people would cost Â£25 to Â£30.Starter :spare ribs, maincourse: prawn and tomato, dessert: banana fritter.On Sunday, everyone has a family meal of Lamb, Pork, beef or Poultry for their choice of meat. Peas, carrots or cauliflower follow for vegetables. Roast or boiled potatoes with gravy. Fruit is nice with a cup of tea to finish.
